heading: Hoarfrost Demise Dungeon Guide
content: Hoarfrost Demise has an incredible Necromancer aspect for leveling, the . With a decent set of monsters and layout, consider running this dungeon should you get a Nightmare Sigil for it. Still, there are more optimal dungeons out there, so this shouldn't be at the top of your grinding list. While every dungeon has a somewhat randomized layout, there are patterns to where objectives and bosses are located. This map will help you identify those layouts so you can complete dungeons faster and maximize your XP and loot per hour! Reviewed by
